translation.en: [quiz show host] That'll be true or false.
The "Ali" of the title is the Welsh football manager?
translation.es: ¿El "Alí" del títuloes el manager del equipo de Gales?

translation.en: -[guest] False. -[host] Yes. Two points scored.
translation.es: - Falso.- Falso. Sí. Ganaron dos puntos. Por último, Carl…

translation.en: And finally, to Carl…
translation.es: Ganaron dos puntos. Por último, Carl…

translation.en: [Robbie Williams] Last night, in the middle of the night, I got up.
[host] Yes, two points. A total of six to the reds!
translation.es: Sí, dos puntos.¡Seis en total para los rojos!

translation.en: [Robbie] I'd been awake all night.
translation.es: No dormí en toda la noche.

translation.en: [host] Great! Now over to the yellows to do the spinning.
[Robbie] When it comes time to sleep, my body goes, "We're not!"
translation.es: Cuando quiero dormir,mi cuerpo dice: "¡Hoy no!

translation.en: "We're not."
Four hours of just tossing and turnin' and…
translation.es: Cuatro horas dando vueltas en la cama

translation.en: dealing with an amorphous blob of stuff.
translation.es: y lidiando con una masa amorfa de cosas.

translation.en: [man] Fancy doing a bit of singing?
[Robbie] Fear.
Shame.
Pain.
The whole gamut of human emotions.
I'm nearly 50.
I'm a dad, dad of four, with a loving wife.
translation.es: Soy padre. Tengo cuatro hijos.Una esposa maravillosa.

translation.en: It's astounding what's happened in my life.
translation.es: Es impresionantetodo lo que pasó en mi vida.

translation.en: But it feels as though the past has me in a headlock.
translation.es: Pero siento que el pasadome atrapó y no me suelta.

translation.en: -[crowd chanting] Robbie! Robbie! -[Robbie] Something has to give.
[Robbie] Go on, buddy! You can do it!
Come on!
-[man 1] You good? -I'm fuckin' good at this!
[Graham Norton] One of the biggest-selling solo artists of all time.
translation.es: Eres uno de los solistas más vendidosde toda la historia.

translation.en: [Jonathan Ross] One of the greatest showmen. [man 2] …platinum albums, sell-out gigs…
translation.es: - Uno de los mejores artistas…- …álbumes de platino, recitales llenos…

translation.en: Keep telling me I'm fuckin' great.
translation.es: Síganme diciendo que soy el mejor.

translation.en: Off me fucking tits.
Would anybody like to see me fight Liam?
See if you can do your best with that!
translation.es: ¡Fíjate si puedes hacer algo con eso!

translation.en: I'm fucking Robbie Williams.
[Robbie] I am trying to sort out the wreckage of the past.
translation.es: Estoy intentandoreacomodar los escombros del pasado.

translation.en: And I'm picking a rather particular way to exorcise these demons right now.
translation.es: PARTE 1: VAMOS A DESTROZARNOS Elegí una forma muy particularde exorcizar estos demonios.

translation.en: [man 1] Why are we doing it here?
[Robbie] I'm a hermit. If I'm not on stage, I'm in bed.
translation.es: Soy un ermitaño. Si no estoyen un escenario, estoy en la cama.

translation.en: -[man 1] That's why we're here. -[man 2] Yeah. [Robbie laughs] Yeah.
Can we just… Can we start?
[Robbie] When I was a kid, I was kinda like thick.
translation.es: Cuando era pequeño, era un poco burro.

translation.en: Can't spell. I can't add up or subtract.
translation.es: No sabía de ortografía.No sabía sumar ni restar.

translation.en: [man] Tape is rolling.
[Robbie] I left school at 16 with no qualifications whatsoever
translation.es: Abandoné la escuela a los 16sin mi diploma

translation.en: and joined a boy band
translation.es: y me uní a una boy band

translation.en: that's gonna be the English version of New Kids on the Block.
translation.es: que iba a ser la versión inglesade New Kids on the Block.

translation.en: [man] Four, three, two, one.
[reporter] Fantastic!
Wow, the crowd loved you! How long have you been together?
translation.es: ¡El público los ama!¿Hace cuánto están juntos?

translation.en: -About two months. -Two months.
[reporter] Did you all dance beforehand?
Well, I didn't do much dancin'. Just, like, local discos and everythin'.
translation.es: Yo no solía bailar mucho.Solo en la disco y eso.

translation.en: But I did enough to keep up with these lot. -[laughter on video] -[video stops]
translation.es: Pero ensayé muchopara poder seguirles el paso a ellos.

translation.en: Fuckin' 'ell.
Look at me!
I look very young.
You know, I was the baby of the band.
[Robbie] I enjoyed everybody's company.
In my head, I'm looking up to these older brothers that are, like, 20, 21, 22.
translation.es: Los consideraba hermanos mayoresde 20, 21 y 22 años.

translation.en: When you're 16, that's… that gap's huge.
translation.es: Yo tenía 16. La diferencia era enorme.

translation.en: [Robbie] I couldn't help but be in awe of Gaz.
He was the captain of the ship.
How many songs have you actually got together now?
We've got probably about 30 tracks in all.
Every week, Gary's coming in with new material. We're doin' new dances all the time. ♪ Do what you like ♪
translation.es: Cada semana, Gary trae cancionesy aprendemos coreografías nuevas.

translation.en: [Robbie] In the early days of Take That, it was fun.
translation.es: Los comienzos de Take Thatfueron muy divertidos.

translation.en: The joy and the excitement, the exhilaration.
translation.es: Había mucha alegría, emoción y euforia.

translation.en: It felt like this was all going somewhere.
It felt big! And then it became massive.
translation.es: Que íbamos a crecer.Y nos volvimos gigantes.

translation.en: Okay, so it's pretty quiet now, but you should've been here 20 minutes ago.
translation.es: Ahora hay silencio,pero no se imaginan hace 20 minutos.

translation.en: They are the hottest young band anywhere in the UK.
translation.es: Son el grupo de jóvenes más populardel Reino Unido.

translation.en: …most popular British group since the Beatles.
translation.es: ¡El grupo más popular desde los Beatles!

translation.en: -[screaming] -Take That!
These girls say they've had the best night of their lives. -♪ You're my lifeline ♪ -♪ Whoa, whoa… ♪
translation.es: Estas chicas dicenque fue la mejor noche de sus vidas.

translation.en: [Robbie] Our success did give some sort of sense of…
translation.es: Nuestro éxito nos hacía sentir lo máximo.

translation.en: [Robbie] But it was always intercut with…
[TV host] You're on bedroom walls across Britain, and you get mobbed wherever you go.
translation.es: Están en cada habitación del Reino Unidoy los siguen hordas de gente.

translation.en: Do you still enjoy it?
[young Robbie] It's still enjoyable,
and it's like, um, I wake up in the morning pinchin' meself. "Is this really happening?" and
translation.es: Cada mañana me pellizcoy me pregunto: "¿Esto es real?".

translation.en: it isn't.
-We're not 'ere really, are we? -No, we're not.
translation.es: - De hecho, no estamos aquí, ¿no?- No.

translation.en: [current Robbie] Externally, I'm sure that I would've been full of bravado and trying to look as though I think I'm the man.
translation.es: Por fuera, parecía que yo era un fanfarróny que me tenía mucha confianza.

translation.en: It was a complete
dunking
into the grown-up… world
that I wasn't ready for.
translation.es: para la que no estaba listo.

translation.en: Thank you and good night!
The workload was relentless.
We do this.
Then we get to there.
There was no five minutes in front of us.
translation.es: No teníamos ni cinco minutos de descanso.

translation.en: Reason they're screaming is 'cause Elvis is 'ere as well.
translation.es: Están gritandoporque Elvis también está aquí.

translation.en: Got to go and do an interview now for Radio 1.
translation.es: Tenemos que ir a hacer una entrevistapara Radio 1.

translation.en: We'll hopefully have lots of fun.
[DJ] It is a very special Rockland this afternoon.
translation.es: Nos espera una tarde muy especialaquí en Rockland.

translation.en: As we promised a few weeks ago,
we have the members, all five members, of Take That in the studio.
translation.es: tenemos en el estudioa los cinco miembros de Take That.

translation.en: Gary and Howard and Jason and Robbie and Mark.
translation.es: Gary, Howard, Jason, Robbie y Mark.

translation.en: It's been going very well. Congratulations for the chart success you've had.
translation.es: Les está yendo muy bien.Felicitaciones por el éxito que lograron.

translation.en: How does it affect your everyday life when you get up in the morning?
translation.es: ¿Cómo afecta su vida cotidianaal despertar cada mañana?

translation.en: To speak the truth, and this is honest, I wake up some mornings and think,
translation.es: Sinceramente, y lo digo de verdad,algunas mañanas pienso:

translation.en: "Where am I, what do we do, and what's me name?"
Who are you, what do you do, and what is yer name?
I'm Robbie.
I am in Take That, and I sing and dance.
translation.es: Soy de Take That. Canto y bailo.

translation.en: It was an unusual scenario to be in.
In a very intense background atmosphere and surrounding.
translation.es: Todo nuestro entorno,lo que nos rodeaba, era muy intenso.

translation.en: That is a pressure cooker.
Without meaning to brag, it's been… it's been going good for us,
translation.es: Sin ánimos de presumir,nos ha ido muy bien,

translation.en: so it could end for us, like, at anytime, and then all the people we laugh at--
translation.es: pero podría acabarse en cualquier momento,y la gente de la que nos reímos…

translation.en: [Robbie] I'm still down to earth and humble.
translation.es: Yo sigo siendo sensato y humilde.

translation.en: No, you're not! You're… You're downright arrogant and… and blasé and…
translation.es: Para nada. Eres arrogante y apático.

translation.en: -Downright arrogant, yeah. -I'm not.
You are.
[current Robbie] When I turned about 19,
I started to have a long, hard think about what was happenin'.
translation.es: empecé a pensar seriamenteen lo que estaba pasando.

translation.en: Too many interviews, too many performances,
so many countries to visit, and then repeat it.
translation.es: y visitábamos muchísimos países sin parar.

translation.en: Mark's been up since half past five,
translation.es: Mark está despierto desde las 5:30 a. m.

translation.en: and I've been up since about quarter to six, six o'clock.
translation.es: Yo me despertécomo a las 5:45 o 6:00 a. m.

translation.en: And we can't go to sleep. Jet lag. Who needs it? D'you know what I mean?
translation.es: No podemos dormir. Tenemos jet lag.Pero ¿quién necesita dormir?

translation.en: Take That's fandom was obsessive.
[current Robbie] It was intense!
[man] Step!
[Robbie] On top of that, there was an assurancy about Gaz and his ability
translation.es: A eso se le sumaba la confianzaen Gaz y sus capacidades,

translation.en: mixed with
a coldness.
This is me prize lyric book, this is, and it's really strange to look through.
translation.es: Este es mi amado cuaderno de canciones.

translation.en: It's got all the songs I've ever written.
translation.es: Tiene todos los temas que compuse.

translation.en: Every now and again, you'll find a little star next to it, which means it's gone on an album.
translation.es: Algunas están marcadas con una estrellita,lo que significa que están en un álbum.

translation.en: That'll do me!
[Robbie] And it seemed like
translation.es: Parecía que la única carreraque importaba en Take That

translation.en: there was one person being managed in Take That, and it was Gary Barlow.
translation.es: Parecía que la única carreraque importaba en Take That era la de Gary Barlow.

translation.en: It was all geared around him.
And as a young person, I would've been jealous of that.
translation.es: Yo era joven y eso me daba celos.

translation.en: I suppose a lot of me resented him.
translation.es: Gran parte de mí tenía resentimiento.

translation.en: One, two, three. "Hi, we're Take That." Okay?
translation.es: Uno, dos, tres. "Hola, somos Take That".

translation.en: -You're gonna do it. -Okay.
Hi, I'm Rob. I'm good. Watch this space for more of the same.
translation.es: Hola, soy Rob. Todo bien.Quédense para ver más de lo mismo.

translation.en: Ready. I'll do it.
-It's good. -Gaz, do you wanna sit at the front?
[current Robbie] I was goin' home from these days thinkin', "This is weird." "Uncomfortable."
translation.es: En aquella época, cuando volvía a casa,pensaba: "Esto es raro. Incómodo".

translation.en: It's Lord of the Flies stuff.
translation.es: Parecía El señor de las moscas.

translation.en: [current Robbie] I wasn't adept
translation.es: No se me daba muy bien

translation.en: at dealing with the dynamics in the band at such an early age.
translation.es: No se me daba muy bien el lidiar con las dinámicas de grupoa tan corta edad.

translation.en: And that's when the wheels came off
translation.es: Y, para mí, ahí es cuando todo se vino abajo.

translation.en: for me.
translation.es: ahí es cuando todo se vino abajo.

translation.en: [posh voice] People do tend to see us as the boys next door, and we still are, funnily enough.
translation.es: La gente nos ve como chicos inocentes,y, curiosamente, lo seguimos siendo.

translation.en: We just happen to be the boys next door for the Lord Lichfield.
translation.es: Solo que ahora somos vecinosde Lord Lichfield,

translation.en: Jacuzzis and outside ser--
Boy? Boy!
Oh, thank you very much.
Went out last night. Didn't get in until six o'clock.
translation.es: Anoche salíy volví a las seis de la mañana.

translation.en: But, you know, do it while you're young, don't ya?
Uh, as I say, really enjoying ourselves, so…
-I've gotta get some booze! -Obsessed.
[Gary] Aw, don't. You've started this bastard now!
translation.es: - Estás obsesionado.- No, ya empezó este desgraciado…

translation.en: [current Robbie] Adding petrol to the fire,
I was ingestin' everything that I could get my hands on. Ecstasy, cocaine, drinking.
translation.es: Ingería cualquier cosa que pudiera:éxtasis, cocaína, alcohol.

translation.en: Couldn't eat a whole one! Wahey!
I'm literally drinking, like, a bottle of vodka bef… a night before going into rehearsals.
translation.es: Bebía una botella entera de vodkacada noche antes de los ensayos.

translation.en: So that's happenin'.
That's happenin' every night.
There was meetings that were had with me
translation.es: Me citaron a un par de reuniones

translation.en: where… "we need you to behave" meetings.
What's the best thing about being here?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo mejor de estar hoy aquí?

translation.en: Um… People not expecting me to be 'ere, and the reaction on their faces when they see me.
translation.es: Ver las reacciones de la gente,porque nadie esperaba que viniera.

translation.en: [woman] Go behind him like a Glastonbury nutter.
translation.es: Párate detrás de él como un loco.

translation.en: [Robbie] It's a Glastonbury nutter.
It's one of them people that get on It'll be Alright… It's Alright on the Night thing.
translation.es: Uno de esos que apareceen It'll be Alright on the Night.

translation.en: [current Robbie] It may have been seen by management that I was letting the side down.
translation.es: Nuestro mánager seguro pensabaque los hacía quedar mal a todos.

translation.en: Especially when I went to Glastonbury.
translation.es: En especial cuando fui al Glastonbury.

translation.en: Anarchy.
[current Robbie] I was told, "This is not how you behave in a boy band."
translation.es: Me dijeron: "Así no se comportaun miembro de una boy band".

translation.en: Actually got nothing interesting whatsoever to say. Which is quite un… uh…
translation.es: No tengo nada interesante que decir,lo cual es bastante…

translation.en: quite a bit disturbin'.
[current Robbie] The sense that, um,
I wasn't ready or capable to fulfill the role that was being asked of me was palpable.
translation.es: de que no estaba listo y no era capazde cumplir con lo esperado era evidente.

translation.en: One day, I went in for rehearsals,
and then at lunchtime, they said, "Rob, we need to have a band meeting."
translation.es: y en el almuerzo me dijeron:"Tenemos que hacer una reunión".

translation.en: I said to the boys I just couldn't be there anymore.
translation.es: Les dije a los chicosque ya no podía ser parte del grupo.

translation.en: Then they said, "Look, we wanna see if we can do this tour as a four-piece."
translation.es: Me dijeron: "Queremos versi podemos presentarnos como un cuarteto.

translation.en: "What do you think?"
And in the end,
translation.es: Y, al fin y al cabo,

translation.en: you know, "What do you think?" was me deciding to leave Take That.
translation.es: a partir de ese "¿Qué opinas?"fue que decidí abandonar Take That.

translation.en: Finally, tonight, the band minus one.
Take That are arguably Britain's most successful group since the Beatles,
translation.es: Podríamos decir que Take Thates la banda más exitosa desde los Beatles,

translation.en: but when they arrived today to record for the BBC's Top of the Pops,
translation.es: pero cuando llegaron hoya grabar Top of the Pops para la BBC,

translation.en: there were just four of them.
[reporter] Is anybody angry with Robbie?
[all shout] Yes!
[reporter] Would you listen to his music if he does a solo career?
translation.es: ¿Escucharías su músicasi se lanza como solista?

translation.en: -No. -♪ Got a head of shattered dreams ♪
[man] Did you have a plan?
[current Robbie] I think the… the plan was
"Let's get wrecked."
♪ Whatever I said, whatever I did I didn't mean it ♪ ♪ I just want ya back for good ♪ ♪ I want you back, I want you back… ♪
[current Robbie] I moved to London as a famous 21-year-old, and I'm just going to parties all the time.
translation.es: Me mudé a Londres a los 21, lleno de fama,y me la pasaba yendo a fiestas.

translation.en: I had no direction. No reason to be.
translation.es: No tenía dirección ni razón de vivir.

translation.en: I'm losing a lot of days to hangovers.
translation.es: Perdí días enteros por las resacas.

translation.en: Losing a sense of self.
Turnin' into something that you don't recognize.
Wanted to make somethin' of myself.
translation.es: Quería hacer algo con mi vida.

translation.en: Achieve somethin'. Be someone.
But there's nothing that I'm doing.
I was just in Groucho doin' a lotta coke.
translation.es: Me la pasaba en Groucho tomando cocaína.

translation.en: [woman] What would you do if you weren't a musician?
translation.es: ¿Qué te gustaría hacersi no fueras músico?

translation.en: -[Robbie] Uh… -Be a footballer?
I dunno, actually. Probably be a pig farmer.
translation.es: La verdad, no sé. Criar cerdos, tal vez.

translation.en: [current Robbie] I needed somebody to help me with the thoughts and melodies that I have in my head.
translation.es: Necesitaba que alguien me ayudaraa ordenar mis pensamientos y mis melodías.

translation.en: ♪ Ooh ♪ ♪ Ooh, ooh ♪
[interviewer] So, who are you?
Who am I? I'm Guy. And I'm, uh…
uh, Rob's MD and producer.
translation.es: DIRECTOR MUSICAL Y CO-COMPOSITOR …el director musical y productor de Rob.

translation.en: [interviewer] So what does that involve?
Mm. You haven't got… How much film have you got?
-[Guy] No rest for the wicked. -[Robbie] No rest for the wicked!
translation.es: - Los malvados no descansan.- ¡Los malvados no descansan!

translation.en: [current Robbie] I set out to make an album, but I didn't know how I was gonna do it.
translation.es: Me propuse hacer un disco,pero no sabía cómo lo haría.

translation.en: [current Robbie] There was a list of people that was sent to me,
and one was Guy Chambers, and I went, "Him."
translation.es: Una de ellas era Guy Chambers,y dije: "Él".

translation.en: He was a jobbin' musician
considering becomin' a teacher 'cause things were drying up.
translation.es: y estaba pensando en ser maestroporque no conseguía mucho trabajo.

translation.en: Apart from the leak in his roof, which he had and couldn't pay to be fixed.
translation.es: Y además tenía una gotera en su casacuyo arreglo no podía pagar.

translation.en: So, we really needed each other.
-Good t… Good takes? -Yeah.
-Good takes? -Yeah. Very good.
-You should have a little break now. -Great. Tell 'em.
translation.es: - Deberías descansar un poco.- Bien. Diles.

translation.en: Have a little break. A walk up the street or something.
translation.es: Ve a descansar un poco.Da unas vueltas o algo.

translation.en: Might want a coat.
[Robbie] I think I'll have a sit down, actually. Okay.
translation.es: - Creo que me voy a sentar un rato.- Bueno.

translation.en: On account of standing up has made me sick.
translation.es: Porque de tanto estar parado me mareé.

translation.en: Sitting down has made me great.
[current Robbie] Life thru a Lens, which was the first album,
translation.es: Life thru a Lens, mi primer disco,

translation.en: was written in 12 days, when I found Guy.
translation.es: lo escribí en 12 días,cuando encontré a Guy.

translation.en: And… I thought we had created something of worth.
translation.es: Sentí que habíamos creado algo valioso.

translation.en: But we are looking at somebody in free fall.
translation.es: Pero yo estaba en caída libre.

translation.en: Addicted to cocaine and alcohol.
translation.es: Adicto a la cocaína y el alcohol.

translation.en: It's impossible to help myself.
It's impossible to stop.
[Guy] You all right?
-[Robbie] Fine. -[laughter]
I don't think there's a chance to feel anythin' other than hungover.
translation.es: No podía sentir otra cosamás que la resaca.

translation.en: And then
not hungover because you are
yet again in the process of, um,
creating a future hangover.
-[background chatter] -[woman] I'm drunk as a skunk.
translation.es: Estoy más borracha que una cuba.

translation.en: I sound… I sound brilliant after that many glasses.
translation.es: Canto estupendodespués de todos estos tragos.

translation.en: -[woman] We've done well. Hurrah! -Hurrah!
[woman] More pineapple!
[Guy] I mean, I knew when I met him, he was drinking, and he had the shakes.
translation.es: Cuando lo conocí,sabía que bebía y era adicto a las drogas.

translation.en: He was so on the edge and, um,
you know…
[interviewer] Challenging? Yeah. Of course.
It's really… It's really challenging.
[Guy] Fuck.
[Robbie] Fuck.
[current Robbie] I think this is the most difficult bit to watch.
translation.es: Esta es la parte más difícil de mirar.

translation.en: Because of… [sighs]
…what I'm putting myself through.
translation.es: lo que me hice a mí mismo.

translation.en: [young Robbie] The last 12 months, I've just sort of lost meself into oblivion of I don't know what.
translation.es: En los últimos 12 meses,siento que me perdí a mí mismo, no sé.

translation.en: And, uh, finding it difficult doing interviews at the minute.
translation.es: Y, en este momento,me cuesta hacer entrevistas,

translation.en: Only 'cause I'm not sure of what I should and shouldn't be saying about things.
translation.es: porque no sé con seguridadqué decir o qué no decir.

translation.en: And I'm just havin'… I'm having so many… so many doubts about meself.
translation.es: Estoy dudando muchísimo de mí mismo.

translation.en: I completely don't like my own company at the minute.
translation.es: No me gusta ni un pocopasar tiempo conmigo mismo.

translation.en: [host] Robbie Williams in the studio!
-Did I mention my new single's out? -[host laughs]
-How are you? -Did I mention my new…
Yes, I'm very well. Let's put this here.
translation.es: Sí, estoy muy bien. Dejaré esto aquí.

translation.en: -I'm very well, and how are you? -Yeah?
[current Robbie] Everybody knows I'm in trouble. And how are you?
translation.es: - Todos sabían que tenía problemas.- ¿Cómo están ustedes?

translation.en: [current Robbie] But, um… I didn't care.
I'd gone past the point of no return.
translation.es: Había llegado al punto de no retorno.

translation.en: And, um…
I needed grown-ups.
My life had spiraled out of control so severely.
translation.es: Mi vida estabatotalmente fuera de control.

translation.en: But my manager understood what needed to happen.
translation.es: Pero mi mánagerentendió lo que necesitaba.

translation.en: I needed to be carted off and taken away to rehab.
[man] Robbie, how you feeling today?
New single out 14th July. It's called "Lazy Days." It's fantastic.
translation.es: Nuevo sencillo el 14 de julio."Lazy Days". Es fantástico.

translation.en: [man] Any message for fans who might be a bit worried about you?
translation.es: ¿Algún mensaje para tus fansque se preocupan por ti?

translation.en: Uh, no, don't be worried about me. I'm fine. But a bit… a bit, um… I'm appalled at the turnout.
translation.es: No se preocupen, estoy bien,pero es un horror que haya tan poca gente.

translation.en: When Michael Barrymore had a problem, there was thousands outside his house.
translation.es: Cuando le pasó a Michael Barrymore,había miles de personas.

translation.en: See ya!
[current Robbie] It's a tough watch.
Reliving that again.
I think the root of that darkness was
translation.es: Creo que la raíz de esa oscuridad

translation.en: the perfect storm
of too much too soon.
But just because, in this moment, I couldn't figure out how to live…
translation.es: Pero que en aquel momentono supiera cómo vivir mi vida…

translation.en: …I knew that it didn't mean that I couldn't.
translation.es: no significaba que no pudiera descubrirlo.

translation.en: You know, you don't wanna be a has-been at 23.
translation.es: Nadie quiere quedar en el olvido a los 23.
